Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button

Annotation Interface ButtonWidget

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface ButtonWidget
This annotation can be applied to a field of any serializable type, in order to display a button widget which, on click, invokes an action specified by the given actionHandler. The returned value is set to the setting on a successful response.
Author:
Paul BÃ¤rnreuther
See Also:

  • Element Details

    • actionHandler

      Class<? extends ButtonActionHandler<?,?,?>> actionHandler
      Returns:
      the action handler that is to be triggered on click. A successful result should be of the same type as the setting that is implemented. The second generic type of the ButtonActionHandler controls which other settings are available during the invocation. Without a updateHandler() set, this does not mean that the buttons state gets changed when one of these settings is changed. See DependencyHandler for further information on how to define these other settings.

    • updateHandler

      Class<? extends ButtonUpdateHandler<?,?,?>> updateHandler
      Returns:
      a handler that controls which other settings trigger a reset of the button when they change (i.e. delete the saved value and enable the button again). See there for further information on how to use this. While the first and third generic type have to agree with the ones of actionHandler(), the second one can, in principle, be different if the settings triggering an update and the settings used on invocation differ. See DependencyHandler for further information on how to define these other settings.
      Default:
      org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button.NoopButtonUpdateHandler.class

    • displayErrorMessage

      boolean displayErrorMessage
      Returns:
      if set to true, error messages are displayed besides the button.
      Default:
      true

    • showTitleAndDescription

      boolean showTitleAndDescription
      Returns:
      if set to true, title and description will be shown above the ButtonWidget
      Default:
      true
